page.title: 07ONE DAY IN MY HOLIDAY
page.content:
Thursday, May 23rd. 1985.
by Lesley Bartlett.
One day in my holiday I got up and waited for a cup of tea in bed. I dressed and went downstairs to breakfast at 8.30.a.m. Afterwards I went upstairs and dressed to go out to Sandringham. After we had been to Sandringham we went back to the hotel and went back to the hotel.We went upstairs to dress for dinner at 5.30p.m. After dinner we went in the lounge.My Nanny had a shandy and I had a Babysham. Me and Nanny went to have tea out.We came back and at 12.30.p.m.me and Nanny went to bed. .
